hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export LAB=lab220 fab init sed -i 's/cpu: 1/cpu: 4/g' tools/cloud/cloud-configs/devstack_multinode_topology.yaml fab devstack.prepare:devstack_multinode # Remove one node from multinode virsh destroy ${LAB}-devstack-server01 virsh undefine ${LAB}-devstack-server01 sleep 30
# Download all components. wget http://172.29.173.233/n1kv/lab220-devstack-server01.qcow2 wget http://172.29.173.233/n1kv/vm_config.xml
# Update disk image export IMAGE_URI=`xmllint --xpath ./domain/devices/disk[1]/./source/@file vm_config.xml | gawk -F\" '{print $2}'` sudo cp lab220-devstack-server01.qcow2 ${IMAGE_URI} virsh define vm_config.xml virsh start ${LAB}-devstack-server01
# Wait until host will be loaded sleep 30
ssh 10.20.21.2 "sudo apt-get install -y git testrepository subunit" #ssh 10.20.21.2 "sudo pip install ecdsa junitxml requests testtools netifaces nose fabric" ssh 10.20.21.2 "wget http://172.29.173.233/n1kv/nexus_1000v_vem-12.04-5.2.1.SK1.2.1.29.S0-1.deb" ssh 10.20.21.2 "git config --global user.email 'you@example.com'" ssh 10.20.21.2 "git config --global user.name 'Your Name'" ssh 10.20.21.2 "git clone https://github.com/openstack-dev/devstack.git" ssh 10.20.21.2 "wget http://172.29.173.233/n1kv/0001-n1kv.patch" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && git am --signoff < ../0001-n1kv.patch" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo '[[local|localrc]]' > local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'MYSQL_PASSWORD=nova' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'RABBIT_PASSWORD=nova' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'SERVICE_TOKEN=nova' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'SERVICE_PASSWORD=nova' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'ADMIN_PASSWORD=nova' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'ENABLED_SERVICES=g-api,g-reg,key,n-api,n-crt,n-obj,n-cpu,n-cond,cinder,c-sch,c-api,c-vol,n-sch,n-novnc,n-xvnc,n-cauth,rabbit' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'disable_service horizon' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'disable_service n-net, q-agt, q-l3' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'enable_service mysql, q-svc, q-dhcp, q-meta, neutron, tempest' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'VOLUME_BACKING_FILE_SIZE=2052M' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_PLUGIN=cisco' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'declare -a Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_SUBPLUGINS=(n1kv)' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_DEVSTACK_VSM=False' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_VSM_IP=10.20.21.3' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_VSM_USERNAME=admin' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_VSM_PASSWORD=Cisco12345' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_UVEM_DEB_IMAGE=/home/localadmin/nexus_1000v_vem-12.04-5.2.1.SK1.2.1.29.S0-1.deb' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_INTEGRATION_BRIDGE=br-int' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'Q_CISCO_PLUGIN_HOST_MGMT_INTF=eth0' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'PHYSICAL_NETWORK=test-physnet1' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'LIBVIRT_FIREWALL_DRIVER=nova.virt.firewall.NoopFirewallDriver' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'API_RATE_LIMIT=False' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'VERBOSE=True' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'DEBUG=True' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo '[[post-config|/etc/neutron/plugins/cisco/cisco_plugins.ini]]' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo '[cisco_n1k]' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && echo 'restrict_network_profiles = False' >> local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack; cat local.conf" ssh 10.20.21.2 "sed -i 's/# Create a small network/neutron cisco-network-profile-create default_network_profile vlan --segment_range 1-3000 --physical_network \$PHYSICAL_NETWORK/g' ~/devstack/lib/neutron"
ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd devstack && ./stack.sh" #~/.env/bin/python ./tools/run_tempest.py -r 10.20.21.2 -f "''" --repo https://github.com/openstack/tempest.git --branch master --kill_time 15120 --wait_time 15000
ssh 10.20.21.2 "wget http://172.29.173.233/n1kv/cisco_plugin_tests.txt" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd /opt/stack/tempest && testr init" ssh 10.20.21.2 "cd /opt/stack/tempest && testr run --load-list ~/cisco_plugin_tests.txt --subunit | subunit-1to2 | subunit2junitxml --output-to=result.xml" || true scp 10.20.21.2:/opt/stack/tempest/result.xml tempest_results.xml
